name: Four Deer
description:
On an intense night of black friday you are trying to get all kind of stuff for your kids till a robber’s club arise and break the panic out of everyone, they instill fear..

AND YOU ?           

Controls:

Z - Basic Attack

X - Special Attack (50 score for Butting, 150 score for MegaCombo)

Arrows - Move

Assets

Thanks to : https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/roar-sound-effect/ for roar sound sfx !
